name: Rick Snyder
bio: Rick Snyder is the author of Escape from Combray (2009). His chapbooks include Paper Poem (2006), Flown Season (2004), and Forecast Memorial (2002). His poems, essays, and translations have appeared in Aufgabe, Fence, jubilat, Jacket, Ping Pong, and other journals. He currently teaches Latin and classical studies at the University of Rochester.
